snippet: The temperance movement, undocumented immigrants and obsessive-compulsive disorder are among the theater topics in this year’s New York International Fringe Festival.
abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews performances at New York International Fringe Festival.
lead_paragraph: The temperance movement, undocumented immigrants and obsessive-compulsive disorder are among the theater topics in this year’s New York International Fringe Festival.

headline.seo: Fringe Festival Never Met a Topic It Didn’t Like
headline.main: Angry Ghosts, Pretty Mushrooms, Temperance Jokes
headline.print_headline: Angry Ghosts, Pretty Mushrooms, Temperance Jokes
headline.kicker: Theater Review | New York International Fringe Festival
